statements: SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_id, product_name FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, details FROM products WHERE details LIKE '%description%';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 80 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_name LIKE 'A%' AND price < 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products WHERE product_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY price ASC, product_id DESC
SELECT product_name, details FROM products WHERE details IS NOT NULL AND price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT product_id, product_name, price, details FROM products WHERE price < 50 OR details LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY product_id ASC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE product_id = 3
SELECT purchase_id, quantity, purchase_date FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY purchase_id
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 30
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE product_id IN (1, 4, 7)
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM purchases GROUP BY product_name
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-03-31'
SELECT * FROM products
SELECT id, name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50
SELECT name, details FROM products WHERE id = 3
SELECT * FROM categories ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT id, category_id, purchase_date FROM purchases WHERE quantity >= 10
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT id, name, price FROM products WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT p.name AS product_name, c.name AS category_name FROM products p INNER JOIN categories c ON p.id = c.id ORDER BY product_name DESC, category_name ASC
SELECT p.name, p.price, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM products p JOIN purchases pur ON p.id = pur.product_id GROUP BY p.name, p.price HAVING total_quantity > 10 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-05-31' AND quantity >= 5 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC
SELECT * FROM Products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT description, in_stock FROM ProductDetails WHERE in_stock = TRUE;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC;

SELECT p.product_name, c.customer_name, pu.purchase_date FROM Products p JOIN Purchases pu ON p.product_id = pu.product_id JOIN Customers c ON c.customer_id = pu.customer_id ORDER BY pu.purchase_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT p.product_name, pd.description, pd.in_stock FROM Products p JOIN ProductDetails pd ON p.product_id = pd.product_id WHERE pd.in_stock = TRUE ORDER BY p.product_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT category_name FROM categories WHERE category_id = 2;
SELECT product_name, description FROM products WHERE product_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, description FROM products WHERE product_id BETWEEN 5 AND 10;

SELECT c.category_name, p.product_name, p.price FROM categories c INNER JOIN product_categories pc ON c.category_id = pc.category_id INNER JOIN products p ON pc.product_id = p.product_id WHERE c.category_name = 'Electronics' ORDER BY p.price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_name, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM customers c INNER JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_id ORDER BY total_purchases DESC;
